title: Lewisville police ID man found dead in creek bed off I-35E
content:
The Scoop Blog  
Updated at 1:35 p.m.: 
 
The victim has been identified as 58-year-old Lonny Lee of Lewisville. 
 
Lee’s roommate reported him missing about 9:30 a.m. Sunday, saying he had walked to the pharmacy to pick up medicine. 
 
An officer checked the routes he might have taken but did not find him. 
 
Police say the pharmacy Lee was headed to was closed for Labor Day. 
 
Staff writer Caleb Downs reports: 
 
A man was found dead Tuesday morning at the bottom of a dry creek bed in Lewisville, police said. 
 
The body was spotted by a passer-by shortly before 9 a.m. in the 900 block of Grandys Lane, just off Interstate 35E. 
 
There were no wounds evident on the man’s body and no signs of foul play, Lewisville police Capt. Dan Rochelle said. 
 
Police are still investigating the death. Authorities have yet to identify the man.
